headline: Where did Captain Hook find his hook?
why: The humor is making light of the fact Captain Hook had one normal hand, and his second hand was a hook.

headline: Do you know why steelworkers on highrises give the best presentations?
why: The humor is making a connection between steelworkers on highrises putting together building using rivets.

headline: I wanted to tell you a joke about paper.
why: The humor is a play on the word terrible versus tear-able. Since paper can tear, the joke plays on the word tear, likening it to terrible.

headline: How can you tell if you are a pirate?
why: The humor is taking a common stereotype of pirate in the US culture where pirates in cartoons say Arrrrr.

headline: How can you tell the difference between a jaguar and a cheetah?
punchline: The jaguar plays by the rules.
why: The humor is taking a play on words equating cheetah to cheater, by saying the jaguar plays by the rules the joke is saying that a cheetch cheats.
